title: Problemi di maestrie
body:
Hello.
during this day or encountered a bug.
..
after finishing a game with Kled.
and after taking S +.
I was not given the token for mastery

replies.body: Nella selva demoniaca non vengono dati i gettoni maestria

Bellissimo il post mezzo italiano e mezzo inglese
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
